   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(scheduler_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([suite/0, all/0]).
   24: 
   25: %% Test cases
   26: -export([basic/1,
   27:          utilization_disable/1]).
   28: 
   29: all() -> [basic,
   30:           utilization_disable].
   31: 
   32: 
   33: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   34: 
   35: 
   36: basic(_Config) ->
   37:     undefined = scheduler:get_sample(),
   38:     undefined = scheduler:get_sample_all(),
   39:     false = erlang:system_flag(scheduler_wall_time, true),
   40:     GS1 = scheduler:get_sample(),
   41:     GS2 = scheduler:get_sample_all(),
   42:     check(scheduler:utilization(GS1, scheduler:get_sample())),
   43:     check(scheduler:utilization(GS2, scheduler:get_sample())),
   44:     true = erlang:system_flag(scheduler_wall_time, false),
   45: 
   46:     S1 = scheduler:sample(),
   47:     S2 = scheduler:sample_all(),
   48: 
   49:     check(scheduler:utilization(1)),
   50: 
   51:     check(scheduler:utilization(S1)),
   52:     check(scheduler:utilization(S2)),
   53:     check(scheduler:utilization(S1, scheduler:sample())),
   54:     check(scheduler:utilization(S2, scheduler:sample())),
   55: 
   56:     S3 = scheduler:sample_all(),
   57:     U13 = scheduler:utilization(S1, S3),
   58:     U13 = scheduler:utilization(S1, remove_io(S3)),
   59:     check(U13),
   60: 
   61:     U23all = scheduler:utilization(S2, S3),
   62:     check(U23all),
   63:     U23 = scheduler:utilization(S2, remove_io(S3)),
   64:     U23 = scheduler:utilization(remove_io(S2), S3),
   65:     U23 = remove_io(U23all),
   66:     check(U23),
   67: 
   68:     ok.
   69: 
   70: %% OTP-17800: Test that utilization(Seconds) restores scheduler_wall_time flag
   71: %% even when it already was globally enabled.
   72: utilization_disable(_Config) ->
   73:     false = erlang:system_flag(scheduler_wall_time, true),
   74:     check(scheduler:utilization(1)),
   75:     true = erlang:system_flag(scheduler_wall_time, false),
   76: 
   77:     undefined = scheduler:get_sample(),
   78:     ok.
   79: 
   80: 
   81: check([{total, Tf, Ts} | List]=U) ->
   82:     io:format("\nU = ~p\n", [U]),
   83:     check_values(Tf, Ts, true),
   84: 
   85:     SchdList = case hd(List) of
   86:                    {weighted, Wf, Ws} ->
   87:                        check_values(Wf, Ws, false),
   88:                        tl(List);
   89:                    _ ->
   90:                        unknown = erlang:system_info(logical_processors_available),
   91:                        List
   92:                end,
   93: 
   94:     lists:foreach(fun({Type, Id, F, S}) when ((Type =:= normal) or (Type =:= cpu) or (Type =:= io)),
   95:                                              is_integer(Id) ->
   96:                           check_values(F, S, true)
   97:                   end,
   98:                   SchdList),
   99:     ok.
  100: 
  101: check_values(F, S, Max100) ->
  102:     true = is_float(F),
  103:     true = F >= 0.0,
  104: 
  105:     $% = lists:last(S),
  106:     Sf = list_to_float(lists:droplast(S)),
  107:     true = Sf >= 0.0,
  108:     true = case Max100 of
  109:                true ->
  110:                    true = F =< 1.0,
  111:                    true = Sf =< 100.0;
  112:                false ->
  113:                    true
  114:            end,
  115:     MaxDiff = 0.055555555555555555,  %% change to 0.05 when float_to_list/2 is fixed
  116:     true = abs(F*100 - Sf) =< MaxDiff,
  117:     ok.
  118: 
  119: 
  120: remove_io({scheduler_wall_time_all,Lst}) ->
  121:     {scheduler_wall_time, remove_io(Lst)};
  122: remove_io(Lst) ->
  123:     lists:filter(fun({io,_,_,_}) -> false;
  124:                     (_) -> true end,
  125:                  Lst).
